Upah Naik Jadi Rp 3,3 Juta, Buruh Sulut Harus Tingkatkan Skill
01 Nov 2019, 07:46 by Ireine Buyung


Foto: Rachman Haryanto

Minahasa Utara - Gubernur Sulawesi Utara (Sulut) Olly Dondokambey bersama Dewan Pengupahan Provinsi Sulut resmi mengumumkan nominal Upah Minimum Provinsi (UMP) Sulut tahun 2020 sebesar Rp 3.310.723 atau naik sebesar 8,51%"Keputusan ini sudah melewati pembahasan bersama. Maka UMP Sulut tahun 2020 diputuskan naik menjadi Rp 3.310.723 dari nominal tahun 2019 Rp 3.050.000" kata Olly di kediaman pribadinya, Desa Kolongan, Kabupaten Minahasa Utara, Jumat (1/11/2019).Sesuai Keppres No.107/2004 menyatakan Pemerintah dalam hal ini Gubernur berwenang menetapkan UMP dengan dapat mempertimbangkan Rekomendasi Dewan Pengupahan dalam menetapkan UMP, yang selanjutnya ditetapkan melalui Peraturan Gubernur Sulawesi Utara No 408 Tahun 2019.Kenaikan UMP diharapkan akan mendorong peningkatan Sumber Daya Manusia (SDM), seiring persaingan ketenagakerjaan di era industri 4.0."Masyarakat pencari kerja harus punya keahlian. Saya dorong Disnakertrans (Dinas Tenaga Kerja dan Transmigrasi) Sulut untuk giat mengaktifkan BLK (Balai Latihan Kerja) agar masyarakat bisa mendapat pelatihan dan keterampilan di situ," pungkasnya.Gubernur juga menyatakan akan meningkatkan pengawasan dalam penerapan UMP dan pemberian sanksi bagi perusahaan yang tidak melaksanakan Peraturan Gubernur tersebut diserahkan kepada Instansi teknis yang membidangi ketenagakerjaan di Provinsi dan Kabupaten/Kota."Hal-hal menyangkut pengawasan dalam penerapan UMP dan pemberian sanksi bagi perusahaan yang tidak melaksanakan Keputusan Gubernur ini diserahkan kepada instansi teknis yang membidangi ketenagakerjaan di Provinsi Sulawesi Utara," jelas Olly.

Wages Up to Rp 3.3 Million, North Sulawesi Workers Must Improve Skills
01 Nov 2019, 07:46 by Ireine Buyung


Photo: Rachman Haryanto

North Minahasa - North Sulawesi Governor Olly Dondokambey together with the North Sulawesi Provincial Wage Council officially announced the North Sulawesi Provincial Minimum Wage (UMP) in 2020 of Rp3,310,723 or an increase of 8.51% "This decision has passed through joint discussions. So the UMP North Sulawesi in 2020 was decided to increase to Rp 3,310,723 from the nominal in 2019 to Rp 3,050,000 "Olly said in his private residence, Kolongan Village, North Minahasa Regency, Friday (11/01/2019). According to Presidential Decree No.107 / 2004 stated the Government in this case the Governor is authorized to determine the UMP by considering the Wage Council Recommendations in setting the UMP, which is subsequently determined through the North Sulawesi Governor Regulation No. 408 of 2019. The increase in the UMP is expected to encourage the improvement of Human Resources (HR), in line with labor competition in the industrial era 4.0 "The job seekers community must have expertise. I encourage the Manpower and Transmigration Office of North Sulawesi to actively activate ifkan BLK (Job Training Center) so that the community can get training and skills there, "he concluded. The governor also stated that he would increase supervision in the application of the UMP and impose sanctions on companies that did not implement the Governor Regulation submitted to technical agencies in charge of employment in the Province and "Matters relating to supervision in the application of the UMP and the imposition of sanctions for companies that do not implement the Governor's Decree are left to the technical agencies in charge of manpower in North Sulawesi Province," Olly explained.
